name: Kigo (juniper)
description:
Description

Kigo is the Japanese word for seasonal phrases used in traditional poetry.

In this short puzzle platformer, a pair of time-travelling protagonists must travel between seasons to collect the scattered repair parts and return home.

Objective

Hit the buttons by jumping on them, and observe what changes in the environment. Try to use that to get both your characters to the goal.

Controls W/A/S/DMove/Jump P1Arrow KeysMove/Jump P2SpaceAdvance Dialogue
